articles.title: ‘The Mitchells vs. the Machines’ May Already Be the Best Animated Movie of the Year - Rolling Stone
articles.description: This Netflix acquisition about a dysfunctional suburban family battling the robot apocalypse is loud, funny, hyperactive, silly, deadpan — and surprisingly great
articles.content: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a 21st century Homo sapien in possession of good fortune, must be in want of dependable Wi-Fi. Take that away, and chaos reigns. The result of a rogue A.I… [+8017 chars]
